FeatureClassToFeatureClass "\\phe\gis\Data Store\Ordnance Survey\CodePoint\OUTPUT DATA\OS_CodePoint.gdb\OScp_PcodeUnitBounds_GB_update" "\\phe\gis\Data Store\Ordnance Survey\CodePoint\PROCESSING\scratch.gdb" OScp_PcodeUnitBounds_GB_update # "POSTCODE "POSTCODE" true true false 8 Text 0 0 ,First,#,\\phe\gis\Data Store\Ordnance Survey\CodePoint\OUTPUT DATA\OS_CodePoint.gdb\OScp_PcodeUnitBounds_GB_update,POSTCODE,-1,-1;UPP "UPP" true true false 20 Text 0 0 ,First,#,\\phe\gis\Data Store\Ordnance Survey\CodePoint\OUTPUT DATA\OS_CodePoint.gdb\OScp_PcodeUnitBounds_GB_update,UPP,-1,-1;PC_AREA "PC_AREA" true true false 2 Text 0 0 ,First,#,\\phe\gis\Data Store\Ordnance Survey\CodePoint\OUTPUT DATA\OS_CodePoint.gdb\OScp_PcodeUnitBounds_GB_update,PC_AREA,-1,-1;Shape_Length "Shape_Length" false true true 8 Double 0 0 ,First,#,\\phe\gis\Data Store\Ordnance Survey\CodePoint\OUTPUT DATA\OS_CodePoint.gdb\OScp_PcodeUnitBounds_GB_update,Shape_Length,-1,-1;Shape_Area "Shape_Area" false true true 8 Double 0 0 ,First,#,\\phe\gis\Data Store\Ordnance Survey\CodePoint\OUTPUT DATA\OS_CodePoint.gdb\OScp_PcodeUnitBounds_GB_update,Shape_Area,-1,-1" #
AddField "\\phe\gis\Data Store\Ordnance Survey\CodePoint\PROCESSING\scratch.gdb\OScp_PcodeUnitBounds_GB_update" PC_DISTRICT TEXT # # 4 # NULLABLE NON_REQUIRED #
AddField "\\phe\gis\Data Store\Ordnance Survey\CodePoint\PROCESSING\scratch.gdb\OScp_PcodeUnitBounds_GB_update" PC_SECTOR TEXT # # 6 # NULLABLE NON_REQUIRED #
Dissolve OScp_PcodeUnitBounds_GB_upda "\\phe\gis\Data Store\Ordnance Survey\CodePoint\OUTPUT DATA\OS_CodePoint.gdb\OScp_PcodeAreaBounds_GB_update" PC_AREA # MULTI_PART DISSOLVE_LINES

FeatureClassToFeatureClass "\\phe\gis\Data Store\Ordnance Survey\CodePoint\OUTPUT DATA\OS_CodePoint.gdb\OScp_PcodeAreaBounds_GB_update" "Database Connections\gisadmin@porgisdb01.sde\PORGISDB01.GISADMIN.OS_CodePoint" OScp_PcodeAreaBounds_GB # "PC_AREA "PC_AREA" true true false 2 Text 0 0 ,First,#,\\phe\gis\Data Store\Ordnance Survey\CodePoint\OUTPUT DATA\OS_CodePoint.gdb\OScp_PcodeAreaBounds_GB_update,PC_AREA,-1,-1;Shape_Length "Shape_Length" false true true 8 Double 0 0 ,First,#,\\phe\gis\Data Store\Ordnance Survey\CodePoint\OUTPUT DATA\OS_CodePoint.gdb\OScp_PcodeAreaBounds_GB_update,Shape_Length,-1,-1;Shape_Area "Shape_Area" false true true 8 Double 0 0 ,First,#,\\phe\gis\Data Store\Ordnance Survey\CodePoint\OUTPUT DATA\OS_CodePoint.gdb\OScp_PcodeAreaBounds_GB_update,Shape_Area,-1,-1" #

Rename "Database Connections\Connection to phegisdb.sde\GISADMIN.OS_CodePoint\GISADMIN.OScp_PcodeDistrictBounds_GB_update" "Database Connections\Connection to phegisdb.sde\GISADMIN.OS_CodePoint\PORGISDB01.GISADMIN.OScp_PcodeDistrictBounds_GB" FeatureClass

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.4.1.5686

idCitation.resTitle: OS Code-Point with Polygons: Postcode District Boundaries GB

dataIdInfo.idCredit: © Crown copyright and database rights [year] Ordnance Survey 100016969.
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
PUBLIC SECTOR MAPPING AGREEMENT (PSMA) LICENCE - please refer to the PSMA licensing guide if you plan to use/publish this data to a non-PHE audience (or contact gis@phe.gov.uk): https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/business-and-government/help-and-support/public-sector/guidance/index.html

DATA CURRENCY: 01/04/2018

OS Code-Point with polygons contains postcode boundaries for Great Britain, including the extent of each postcode unit. It captures every fully matched address in the correct boundary and within the sector boundaries prescribed by Royal Mail, and is significantly more accurate than previous products of this type.

A boundary clearly shows the national extent of each postcode unit, enabling non-addressable data to be analysed on a postcode basis, and results can be related to local authority and National Health areas.

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/business-and-government/products/code-point-with-polygons.html

https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/docs/user-guides/code-point-polygons-user-guide.pdf
dataIdInfo.idPurp: OS Code-Point with Polygons: Postcode District Boundaries GB

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString:
PUBLIC SECTOR MAPPING AGREEMENT (PSMA) LICENCE - please refer to the PSMA licensing guide if you plan to use/publish this data to a non-PHE audience (or contact gis@phe.gov.uk): https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/business-and-government/help-and-support/public-sector/guidance/index.html
OS Code-Point with polygons contains postcode boundaries for Great Britain, including the extent of each postcode unit. It captures every fully matched address in the correct boundary and within the sector boundaries prescribed by Royal Mail, and is significantly more accurate than previous products of this type.A boundary clearly shows the national extent of each postcode unit, enabling non-addressable data to be analysed on a postcode basis, and results can be related to local authority and National Health areas.
https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/business-and-government/products/code-point-with-polygons.html https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/docs/user-guides/code-point-polygons-user-guide.pdf

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: OS Code-Point with Polygons: Postcode District Boundaries GB

gmd:country.gmd:Country: United Kingdom of Great Britain & N. Ireland

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: Polygons created using the most accurate Royal Mail postcode location data points, filtered by positional quality.
